channel.title: Need something...from someone
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Need something...from someone" - Need help with getting emosuke lvl 3.

item.title: Re: Need something...from someone
item.content:encoded: Thread locked. The wiki forum (any forum here) isn't the right place to beg for items.

item.title: Re: Need something...from someone
item.content:encoded:
A Billy Bucket isn't going to help you get another bloodline.

Emosuke 3 isn't going to help you get another bloodline either.

You need to complete Reaper/Trade/Revenge.

Anyway, there are no items that I currently desire. I only need villagers.

item.title: Re: Need something...from someone
item.content:encoded:
well i would get one but i can't get A-ranks yet.
still sp. jonin
and i need to get another bloodline.
and i can't join your village cuz as soon as i turn jonin and get like 100000 ryo i am leaving mine and getting my own.
but if you need an item then i can try to get one for youâ€¦so long as it can be sent.

item.title: Re: Need something...from someone
item.content:encoded:
A.) Wrong section.

B.) Why don't you just get one yourself?

C.) I have no buckets. I don't even have Billy 3 yet, but I may be able to acquire one if you can make a good enough offer. I need villagers for my village.

item.title: Need something...from someone
item.content:encoded:
Can someone send me a Billy Bucket?
my village hasn't contacted me back and i need one to lvl up emosuke.
PLEASE!
my account name is
DemonPupp
i only need one.
am willing to trade an ultra elixer or reversing hourglass.
or if you need something then i can see what i can do.
